name: SWI Deployment Solution
short_description: SWI Deployment Solution is an open source enterprise computer imaging and software delivery solution. Currently, it is using a combination of DHCP, PXE, TFTP, and a client daemon. It uses udpcast to support multicast, and Partimage to deliver the images.
